definition: Closed batch reaction in a tube or well plate
typical_setup: Microliter to milliliter batch with manual handling
pros: Simple low cost and fast setup

definition: Continuous flow reactor with steady-state feed
typical_setup: Channel or tubing with continuous input/output
pros: Potential for continuous production and control

typical_setup: PDMS or glass chip with microchannels
pros: Low reagent use and high control

definition: Other or hybrid formats not covered
